content:
Since the beginning of the large-scale invasion, fighters from the Security Service of Ukraine have already destroyed 800 Russian tanks.

About thisShe reported March 19SBU.

“Soon we will show how the anniversary target was burning. And the staff of the service are already opening up in the next hundred! We work for a full victory, ”the message was written.

ЯкArmyInform reported,As of the morning of March 19, the number of tanks lost by Russia is 6819.
title: Anti-tankers from the special service exchanged the ninth hundred of enemy tanks
description: This was reported by the Security Service of Ukraine on March 19.    "Soon we will show how the anniversary goal burned. And...
author: Army Inform
